//reg [31:0] Instruction, reg [31:0] PC_Plus4
//xxxxxxxxxInstructionxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxPC_Plus4xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx 
//xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxxx xxxxx xxxxx] xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
//xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxxx] xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx 
100011 00000 00001 00000 00000 000000 00000000000000000000000000000000	//0
//load from 0 to 1, then check
000000 00000 00001 00001 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000000001
000000 00000 00001 00001 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000000010	//2

//load form 1 to 2, then check
100011 00000 00010 00000 00000 000001 00000000000000000000000000000011
000000 00000 00010 00010 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000000100	//4
//add 1 & 2 to 3, check
000000 00001 00010 00011 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000000101
000000 00000 00011 00011 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000000110	//6
//subtract 3 from 1 to 4, check
000000 00011 00001 00100 00000 000000 00000000000000000000000000000111
000000 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000 00000000000000000000000000001000	//8
//stl 1 < 4 to 5, check
000000 00100 00001 00101 00000 101010 00000000000000000000000000001001
000000 00000 00101 00101 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000001010	//10

101011 00000 00011 00000 00000 000110 00000000000000000000000000001011
101011 00011 00100 00000 00000 000100 00000000000000000000000000001100	//12
100011 00011 00110 00000 00000 000011 00000000000000000000000000001101
100011 00000 00111 00000 00000 000111 00000000000000000000000000001110	//14
000000 00000 00110 00110 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000001111
000000 00000 00111 00111 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000010000	//16
//should not brnch
000100 00001 00000 00000 00000 000001 00000000000000000000000000010001
000000 00000 00100 00100 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000010010	//18
//should branch
000100 00000 00000 00000 00000 000001 00000000000000000000000000010011
000000 00000 00100 00100 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000010100	//20
//
//addi: 0 and (10) to 8
001000 00000 01000 00000 00000 001010 00000000000000000000000000010101
000000 00000 01000 01000 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000010110	//22
//addi: 3 to (-2) to 9
001000 00011 01001 11111 11111 111110 00000000000000000000000000010111
000000 00000 01001 01001 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000011000	//24
//j
000010 00000 00000 00000 00000 000011 00000000000000000000000000011001
//
//addiu: 3 and (-1) to 10
001001 00011 01010 11111 11111 111111 00000000000000000000000000011010	//26
000000 00000 01010 01010 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000011011
//addiu: 3 and (-big) to 11
001001 00011 01011 11111 00000 000000 00000000000000000000000000011100	//28
000000 00000 01011 01011 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000011101
//andi: 3 and (2) to 12
001100 00011 01100 00000 00000 000010 00000000000000000000000000011110	//30
000000 00000 01100 01100 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000011111
//andi: 3 and (big) to 13
001100 00011 01101 00000 00000 111111 00000000000000000000000000011110	//32
000000 00000 01101 01101 00000 000000 00000000000000000000000000011111
//bne: should branch
000101 00011 00001 00000 00000 000001 00000000000000000000000000011110	//34
000000 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000 00000000000000000000000000011111
//bne: should not branch
000101 00011 00011 00000 00000 000001 00000000000000000000000000011110	//36
000000 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000 00000000000000000000000000011111
//ori: 3 or (big) to 14
001101 00011 01110 00000 00000 111001 00000000000000000000000000011110	//38
000000 00000 01110 01110 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000011111
//slti: 
001010 00011 01111 00000 00000 000001 00000000000000000000000000011110	//40
000000 00000 01111 01111 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000011111
//slti: 
001010 00011 10000 00000 00000 001000 00000000000000000000000000011110	//42
000000 00000 10000 10000 00000 100000 00000000000000000000000000011111
